message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11500. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item valued at $12000 by you, at a price slightly below its perceived value. I believe this offer presents a favorable deal for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. However, I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $11000? I believe this would still provide a good value for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a price of $11200 for the product. This maintains a reasonable profit margin for me while still providing a good value for you.
